oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Samantha Reams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Portrait photograph of Samantha Rebecca Gilbert Scurlock Reams (1853-1933). She lived in the Mechanicsville community near Short Mountain. She was the founder of the Church of God of Short Mountain and was married to Dr. Absalom Henry Reams (1821-1900).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Women; Spiritual leaders
